about_the_game:
Work your way up the ladder of real estate success in Build-a-lot Big Dreams! Developed by HipSoft, the makers of the original Build-a-lot series, Big Dreams is a build and time management game that incorporates both new and classic gameplay features to build, buy, sell and flip properties. Each neighborhood brings new levels of fun to explore with exciting goals and challenges to complete as you build the foundation to your very own street of real estate dreams! New to the Build-a-lot game genre? Don't worry! Free tutorial levels are available and helpful characters greet you in each new neighborhood to offer tips and advice for reaching each set of goals!

Tutorial Levels Teach the Mechanics Of the Game
50 Levels Spanning 6 Different Locations
15 different structures to build including houses, parks, and services
Complete optional goals or find the Garden Gnome on each level to earn Bonus Points
Spend the Bonus Points to gain an advantage on challenging levels
Try the first five levels for free
